author: rgardler
msg: Exclude new widget templates from widget deploy target (they are not really widgets)

Move existing exclude of widget-template into the build file so that the widget.deploy.exclude property can be used as intended - to exclude real widgets. Default value given to exclude property will exclude no widgets.

author: ggregory
msg: Upgrade to maven-pmd-plugin 2.5 (=PMD 4.2.5) from 2.4 (=PMD 4.2.2). The reports are the same.
